TextView.android:text:
- The system picks a sequence of colors.
- The number of colors is the code length.
- The objective of the game is to guess the exact positions of the colors in the system's sequence.
- By default, a color can be used only once in a code sequence.
- If you start a new game with the 'Allow duplicates' checked, then any color can be used any number of times in the code sequence.
- After filling a line with your guesses and clicking on the 'Check' button, the system responses with the result of your guess.
- For each color in your guess that is in the correct color and correct position in the code sequence, the system display a small black color on the right side of the current guess.
- For each color in your guess that is in the correct color but is NOT in the correct position in the code sequence, the system display a small white color on the right side of the current guess.
- You win the game when you manage to guess all the colors in the code sequence and when they all in the right position.
Good luck !
